attn_node.name: PAU_PHY_FIR
attn_node.bit: FIR Register - A RX state machine parity or mode register parity error has occurred (IOO0).

FIR Register - A RX state machine parity or mode register parity error has occurred (OMI1).

FIR Register - A PPE internal error has occurred.
FIR Register - A PPE external error has occurred.

FIR Register - PPE Halted.
